features: Simple, sturdy and up for everything. That’s the standard we hold our gear to. So we built the Standard Pack to embody those promises. With a large main compartment, external padded laptop compartment, internal laptop sleeve, and padded back panel and base, this bag is built to be your ideal everyday carry. We added an adjustable gear strap (for when you need a little extra room) and our PackFast™ Bag Attachment Loops for easily clipping to your Travel Bag or Travel Bag Roller.
